user_query: I'm a music lover and I'm looking for new tracks to add to my playlist. Can you suggest some popular tracks based on my musical preferences? Additionally, I would like to download the MP3 files for these tracks. It would be great if you could also provide me with the coin details for the artists of these tracks.

TaskList.description: Fetch popular music tracks based on the user's musical preferences.
Download MP3 files for the suggested tracks.
Retrieve coin details for the artists of the suggested tracks.
